ComicInfo.Title: The Trap! Part II; New Game of Death II; Manic Monday; Catharsis Part One; Bad Citizen
ComicInfo.Writer: James D. Hudnall,Len Strazewski,Hank Kanalz,Roland Mann,Buzz Dixon,James D. Hudnall,Len Strazewski,Hank Kanalz,Roland Mann,Buzz Dixon
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Trap! Part II: Will the Solution survive The Trap?
New Game of Death II: Arena and Ranger fight against the Techuza, Arena's former masters.
Manic Monday: Jack Bodick, the Eliminator, hunts down criminals for a price
Catharsis Part One: Who is Catharsis, and why does she kill? Sludge wants to know.
Bad Citizen: Another merc assignment for Casino.
